      • reportProblemsFromExternalSource

        public void reportProblemsFromExternalSource(VirtualFile file,
                                             java.lang.Object source)
        Description copied from class: WolfTheProblemSolver
        Reports that the specified file contains problems that cannot be discovered by running the general highlighting pass for the file.
        Specified by:
        reportProblemsFromExternalSource in class WolfTheProblemSolver
        source - Identifies the component that discovered the problems. A file is highlighted as problematic if it has problems from GeneralHighlightingPass or from at least one source.

      • clearProblemsFromExternalSource

        public void clearProblemsFromExternalSource(VirtualFile file,
                                            java.lang.Object source)
        Description copied from class: WolfTheProblemSolver
        Reports that the specified file no longer contains problems discovered by the specified source. If the file has no problems from GeneralHighlightingPass or from any other sources, it will no longer be highlighted as problematic.
        Specified by:
        clearProblemsFromExternalSource in class WolfTheProblemSolver
